creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
description: dock in foreground with long footbridge at right extending toward buildings beyond in background; rows of boats on water at left; figures on footbridge; little girl, LLC, talking to bearded sailor looking up onto dock
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

LRC, in pencil: T.301 / no 8 / dia | On back, in pencil: 59519 (,) C11211 (and) Embarcadère sur la Tamise
markings: LRC, stamped in black: R.Mx | LRQ in bottom margin, stamped in red: JAL
provenance: Edith and Norman Garmezy, Edina, MN; Richard Reed Armstrong, Chicago; ex-collection of Claude Roger-Marx
title: Pier on the Thames
